title: Me as a designer
desc:
I am an interdisciplinary designer with an affinity for understanding different perspectives to create designs and products that really matter to people. I am passionate about solving problems and delivering the highest value for both customers and businesses through clean and simple design. Currently I’m looking for UX/ UI or graphic design opportunities and am busy as a freelance designer working on small-scale projects for individual clients and local communities. 
 Do we share interests or have a project coming up? Let’s get in touch.

title: My education
desc: I graduated with a bachelor in Physical education in Skopje. During my studies I also signed up for an extensive graphic design program at Semos where I found my new passion for design. Soon after completion of the graphic design program I enrolled for an intensive 8 months UX/UI academy at Brainster parallel to my studies where I gained both theoretical and practical experiences. I am looking forward to further expanding my design knowledge and practices.

title: Me as a person
desc: I have been playing basketball since I was four year old. I have played for the Macedonian National Team in European championships and currently playing in the First National League. Basketball has taught me some key values and principles that made me the person I am today – value of teamwork, punctuality, discipline, hard work and determination.
